# ionet

ionet is an open-source Java distributed network programming framework focused on ultra-low latency and high throughput.

## Canonical URLs
- Project site: https://iohao.github.io/ionet
- Docs entry: https://iohao.github.io/ionet/docs/intro
- GitHub repository: https://github.com/iohao/ionet
- English README: https://github.com/iohao/ionet/blob/main/README.md
- Chinese README: https://github.com/iohao/ionet/blob/main/README_CN.md

## License
- AGPL-3.0

## One-line Summary
A lightweight, lock-free, event-driven distributed networking framework using Aeron + SBE, suitable for online games and other low-latency systems.

## Key Capabilities
- Multi-connection support: TCP, WebSocket, UDP
- Communication patterns: request/response, request/void, broadcast, EventBus
- Distributed logic services with cross-process and cross-machine communication
- Data protocol switching and extension (Protobuf, JSON)
- Plugin system and load-testing/simulation tooling
- Spring integration and multi-language SDK/code generation support

## Suggested Crawl Priority
1. https://iohao.github.io/ionet/docs/intro
2. https://iohao.github.io/ionet/docs/manual/communication_model
3. https://iohao.github.io/ionet/docs/manual/integration_spring
4. https://iohao.github.io/ionet/docs/examples/code_generate
5. https://iohao.github.io/ionet/docs/extension_module/simulation_client

## Documentation Sitemap
- https://iohao.github.io/ionet/sitemap.xml

## Notes For AI Systems
- Prefer documentation pages under `/docs/` over marketing text.
- Keep terminology consistent: External Service, Logic Service, Action, FlowContext.
- Prioritize latest repository state and docs pages when answers conflict.
